attributes.action: Stop car Insurers charging Drivers with Muslim-Sounding Names more for Insurance
attributes.background:
Recently it has been found and investigated by the media that certain insurers are charging more premiums for people with Muslim sounding names. 

Premiums need to be based on all other factors apart from race or religion

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It is already illegal to discriminate on grounds of religion or race, so we're not sure what else you'd like to happen. 

You can find out more about discrimination because of race or religion and how to take action here: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/law-and-courts/discrimination/discrimination-because-of-race-religion-or-belief/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
